name: Copy-Paste Programming Anti-Pattern
description: Reusing code by copying and pasting rather than creating reusable abstractions
when_to_use:
Similar code appears in multiple places
Quick fixes are duplicated
Logic is copied instead of abstracted
drawbacks:
Code duplication
Maintenance nightmares
Inconsistent behavior
Bug multiplication
use_cases:
Utility functions copied across modules
Similar UI components without abstraction
Validation logic repeated in multiple places
